title: AUTO LOCK CAMERA BUG/GLITCH PLEASE HELP!!!
body: Hello guys im pretty new to league and i really enjoy the game so far the problem for me is that all of a sudden in every game my camera dosent move if i press y it does not change the lock and nothing happens so i have to click the little camera thing beside the mini map to keep the camera locked onto my character but for me playing that way is really damn annoying. This bug or glitch is also affecting the in game shop if i click it nothing happens so i have to click where it shows me how much money i have to buy items I ALSO CANNOT PING before i used to be able to press g and click and drag on what ping i wanted to use but now it wont show me that instead every time it would be the enemy is missing ping when i click after pressing g i cannot select something in the shop unless i double click clicking ounce does nothing the only way i can see parts of the map is double clicking the mini map and draging my camera. Please help me on what to do I love this game so much and it would suck if i could not play being happy.

replies.body:
Hmmmmm those camera and keybind issues might both be related to your configuration files being a little wonky. Let's try resetting those files really quickly to see if that fixes both issues at once!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
